data.title: Flor Silvestre's last advice to her granddaughter Ángela Aguilar prior to her departure
data.meta_description: The 18-year-old debuted on her tour called “Mexicana Enamorada” due to her great talent and professionalism on stage
data.text:
The famous Mexican singer Ángela Aguilar belongs to one of the families most adored by the people of Mexico, since the young woman is included in the group of the most privileged voices of the Aguilar Dynasty.

At only 18 years old and being the youngest in Los Aguilar, the singer has demonstrated her great talent in the world of music, so she has made her way into her professional career by winning awards and performing at important international events, where she has always been supported by her father Pepe Aguilar.

Likewise, it is no secret that the Aguilar Dynasty was led by Angela's grandparents, Antonio Aguilar and Flor Silvestre, who died on July 25 November 2020. However, before leaving, the renowned Mexican singer and actress left a few words for Pepe Aguilar's daughter.

In an old video that went viral again it was shown that in a family conviviality, Angela starred in an emotional moment when she sang Reina de la Canción Mexicana a cappella combined with the melody of a guitar for Flor Silvestre, who was sitting on an armchair proudly listening to the powerful voice of her granddaughter.

And although the video was very short, it was heard promptly that the late performer of Gaviota Traidora, dedicated some words as advice to Ángela Aguilar. At first I wish that God would always take care of her, that in addition all the interpretations she does are with “love” and finally that she would make melodies with feeling, to which the interpreter of La Llorona, argued that in the first instance she would have to be in love to carry out her grandmother's counselors to the letter.

Currently the performer of En realidad is on her tour started this 2022, which was part of the promotion of her album Mexicana Enamorada which is the third studio album and the second solo album that Angela has worked on. The album was produced by his father Pepe Aguilar and was released by the record label Machin Records on September 24, 2021.

During the third week of March, some netizens reported the presence of Ángela Aguila r in Mexico City, her arrival was marked by unknown until some videos were leaked where Pepe Aguilar's daughter is heard singing in a duet with Yuridia, which has excited fans of Mexican regional music .

It was since the end of 2021 that the important Mexican composer and progenitor of Ángela Aguilar detailed through his Instagram account through a live show that Yuridia would make a duet with Ángela Aguilar.

After this, at the beginning of March Pepe Aguilar decided to break the silence by sharing that his daughter and the former Academic were working together on a new song, but he did not give any details, such as the release date or whether he would have any videos; however, because of the video leaked on digital platforms, everything seems to indicate that the song will have its own video and will be released this year.

And, although no further details are known about when this musical duet will be released, Yuridia shared an Instagram story in which she wrote: “No, I finished the videos, now I'll wait until 2026 for everything to come out,” said the composer and singer of Amigos no please.
